name: CatX
headline: The digital marketplace for insurance risk
description: CatX is a digital marketplace connecting insurance carriers with institutional investors to trade and transfer insurance risk efficiently. We help to make insurance risk models understandable and accessible for asset managers so they can unlock new sources of returns. In addition, we streamline and digitalize the entire risk transfer process, so insurers can get faster, cheaper access to capital from our partner funds.

founders.name: Benedict Altier, Founder
founders.description: Benedict has advised more than 10 leading insurers and asset managers working across insurance, reinsurance, and risk modeling. He is also a front-end developer with a decade's worth of experience designing and building web applications. He graduated with a 1st class degree in Chinese Studies from the University of Oxford. As a visiting student at Peking University, he advised leading Chinese technology companies including a spin-out from Baidu.

founders.name: Lucas Schneider, Co-Founder and CTO
founders.description:
Building CatX to revolutionize risk transfer for insurers. Bringing my expertise in financial markets and investing to the insurance world. 

Started my career in Credit Securitisation at Barclays in London where I structured and executed multiple transactions in excess of $10bn+ in value. Oxford PhD Candidate in Machine Learning for Gene Editing. Previously, leading the research team at a web3 hedge fund, focusing on infrastructure and decentralized finance investments.

# Introducing total risk intelligence
# Our technology helps insurers to underwrite risks more effectively, brokers improve their client experiences and investors unlock uncorrelated investment opportunities
Projects
40k+
Where ideas flourish and projects thrive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/66d0a29bcf9b7c9616b9392e_0_3kNFqkCqG5z7C_ul.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/6605a392ed3d1d41fd40227d_lloyds.png)

## About Us
[Contact Us![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c790b992e1bd403196db70_ic-arrow-btn.svg)](https://catx.re/</contact-us>)
CatX helps insurers and investors to analyze opportunities in insurance, reinsurance and retrocession. We work directly with leading brokers to structure bespoke investment opportunities. 
  * **Digital:** CatX gives you access to world-class tools for modelling insurance risk and managing insurance risk transactions. 
  * **Transparent:** We use special purpose vehicles and segregated account structures managed by trusted, independent insurance managers.
  * **Regulated:** We are regulated as an innovative marketplace provider by the Bermuda Monetary Authority.

What We Do
## CatX helps to connect institutional investors, (re)insurers, risk managers and brokers through a regulated digital marketplace. 
[Investors**Get access to uncorrelated investment opportunities in insurance risk.** Learn More![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c790b992e1bd403196db70_ic-arrow-btn.svg)](https://catx.re/</catx-for-investors>)

What We Do
## Best-in-class technology
#### Marketplace
Transact insurance risk through our digital trading venue. 
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d8_ic-analyze.svg)
#### Risk Models
Understand key risk drivers underpinning pricing and portfolio management. 
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d4_ic-collaborate.svg)
#### Automation
Streamline the origination and structuring process on our platform.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d3_ic-insight.svg)
#### Machine learning
Improve decision-making through AI document analysis and workflows. 
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d6_ic-intuitive.svg)
#### Pricing engine
Transact securely on the platform through advanced pricing and bidding functionality.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d5_ic-power.svg)
#### Secure sharing
Easy and secure collaboration with all counterparties with full control over your data and files. 
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c790b892e1bd403196d761/65c796005d8fbef43858f6d7_ic-smart.svg)
### Integrates with world-class risk models
CatX integrates directly with world leading model providers and analytics.
[Explore models and integrations](https://catx.re/</integrations>)

For Investors
## Introducing a new, uncorrelated asset class 
#### [Demystifying insurance-linked securitiesInsurance-linked Securities](https://catx.re/</insurance-linked-securities>)
[](https://catx.re/</case-study/maximizing-roi-a-fintech-integration-case-study-in-the-financial-sector>)
What we offer
## Key risk transfer instruments and structures 
#### Reinsurance Contracts
Privately placed instruments tailored to the needs of the (re)insurer. They offer the highest degree of flexibility in risk exposure selection and legal structuring. 
Instruments
#### Catastrophe Bonds
Publicly placed securities, typically 144a notes with standardized and clearly defined terms, conditions and potential loss scenarios. ‍
Instruments
#### Proportional 
Protects a proportion of a (re)insurers portfolio by sharing the performance results directly with investors.‍
Structures
#### Non-Proportional
Features single risks allowing (re)insurers to select the risks they want to transfer and investors to select investments in which to invest. 
Structures
#### Parametric 
One of the simplest structures to transfer risk. Parametric covers feature a fixed payoff when triggered, allowing for faster settlements. ‍
Structures
### **Catamaran** helps funds, reinsurers and brokers create and analyze opportunities.
Turn traditional insurance submissions into sophisticated digital deal rooms with access to powerful risk models. Extract data from any file in minutes using our powerful artificial intelligence models. 
[Learn More](https://catx.re/<https:/www.trycatamaran.com>)

## About Us
Contact Us![Arrow⟨10⟩](https://catx.re/</contact-us>)
CatX helps insurers and investors to analyze opportunities in insurance, reinsurance and retrocession. We work directly with leading brokers to structure bespoke investment opportunities. 
  * **Digital:** CatX gives you access to world-class tools for modelling insurance risk and managing insurance risk transactions. 
  * **Transparent:** We use special purpose vehicles and segregated account structures managed by trusted, independent insurance managers.
  * **Regulated:** We are regulated as an innovative marketplace provider by the Bermuda Monetary Authority.

For Investors
## Introducing a new, uncorrelated asset class 
#### Demystifying insurance-linked securitiesInsurance-linked Securities⟨37⟩
[](https://catx.re/</case-study/maximizing-roi-a-fintech-integration-case-study-in-the-financial-sector>)
What we offer
## Key risk transfer instruments and structures 
#### Reinsurance Contracts
Privately placed instruments tailored to the needs of the (re)insurer. They offer the highest degree of flexibility in risk exposure selection and legal structuring. 
Instruments
#### Catastrophe Bonds
Publicly placed securities, typically 144a notes with standardized and clearly defined terms, conditions and potential loss scenarios. ‍
Instruments
#### Proportional 
Protects a proportion of a (re)insurers portfolio by sharing the performance results directly with investors.‍
Structures
#### Non-Proportional
Features single risks allowing (re)insurers to select the risks they want to transfer and investors to select investments in which to invest. 
Structures
#### Parametric 
One of the simplest structures to transfer risk. Parametric covers feature a fixed payoff when triggered, allowing for faster settlements. ‍
Structures
### **Catamaran** helps funds, reinsurers and brokers create and analyze opportunities.
Turn traditional insurance submissions into sophisticated digital deal rooms with access to powerful risk models. Extract data from any file in minutes using our powerful artificial intelligence models.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: CatX**

Founded in 2023 and currently a standout member of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, CatX is on a simple yet ambitious mission: to establish a digital marketplace for insurance risk. Located in Dover, DE, it operates with a lean team of just two employees and is backed by notable figures like Tom Blomfield, serving as a Group Partner.

**What CatX Does**

At its core, CatX connects insurance carriers with institutional investors, enabling them to trade and transfer insurance risk in an efficient manner. The platform not only demystifies complex insurance risk models for asset managers but also streamlines the risk transfer process, providing insurers faster, cheaper access to capital through partnerships with various funds.

Recent developments include the launch of Catamaran Parametric, a suite of tools for parametric insurance transactions, aimed at enhancing the capabilities of both insurers and brokers. Here, you can access state-of-the-art technology tailored for better risk analysis, underwriting, and investor opportunities.

**Tagging the Trends**

The company is affiliated with a range of cutting-edge fields: machine learning, finance, analytics, insurance, and investing. It brings together over 40,000 projects and more than 20 capital providers, creating an ecosystem where ideas flourish and yield high returns.

**Unique Selling Proposition**

1. **Digital Access**: Offers world-class tools for modeling and managing insurance risk transactions.
2. **Transparency**: Employs special purpose vehicles and segregated accounts, providing independent management oversight.
3. **Regulation**: Operates under the guidance of the Bermuda Monetary Authority as an innovative marketplace provider.

**What’s Happening Now**

CatX is not just resting on its laurels. It is active in developing its marketplace, infusing AI and machine learning into its processes. This includes advanced pricing mechanisms and the integration of reliable risk models, ensuring clients can transact securely and effectively.

With **$700 million+** in listed opportunities, **50+ funds**, and **$650 billion+** in total fund AUM, CatX is opening doors to investment opportunities previously viewed as inaccessible.

**Future Directions**

As CatX continues to innovate, it aims to position insurance-linked securities (ILS) as a reliable and uncorrelated asset class. The focus is on flexible risk transfer structures, including catastrophe bonds and parametric insurance, to attract diverse investments.

In a world where understanding and trust are paramount, CatX stands to revolutionize the insurance landscape, marrying technology with risk management in ways that make sense to investors, insurers, and brokers alike.

For those willing to explore more, CatX invites inquiry through its website [CatX.re](https://catx.re). With such an ambitious agenda and a solid foundation, it's not just a company to watch—it's one to join in this evolving narrative of risk and investment.
